Message.Title: Living Sozial (Instant) hurt the following important patent #8,032,427 of Local Corp
Message.Msg: Abstract of patent #8,032,427 of Local Corp A localization service is provided that provides users with online information on local retailers that sell particular products. A user can perform a search using a web page associated with the localization service or by searching using an internet search engine. The user's search includes a search origin. The search origin may be defined in terms of location information such as a place name or a postal code. A search for a particular product at local retailers may be made using search parameters such as search origins, product names, model numbers, product categories, and product attributes. The localization service may provide the user with search results in the form of web pages that list which retailers sell the desired product in the vicinity of the search origin. A targeted advertisement server at the localization service may use display criteria to determine which targeted advertisements should be displayed for the user.

Topic.Title: Living Sozial (Instant) hurt the following important patent #8,032,427 of Local Corp

Message.Msg: Patent #8,032,427 related to location based product search appears to encompass core aspects of services being offered by Groupon (GRPN) (Groupon Now), Living Social (Instant) and Foursquare; and is part and parcel of the product search functionalities offered by eBay's Milo (Nasdaq: EBAY), Gannett's ShopLocal (NYSE: GCI), Jiwire's NearbyNow, Retailigence and Goodzer. Source: Seeking Alpha

Topic.Title: Guess last week's court decision wasn't so bad for AMZN:

Message.Msg: Nasdaq 6000 is a pumper idiot.... Sybs been dribbling into the short side of this pig for roughly 6 weeks ... On pops sybil takes a sheit on this gimmick by betting a small amount relative to sybils bank ... These pumper clowns are all the same, it works the same way on the long side of a dog too... They make up whatever numbers that are convenient for their delusuional stories and fill in a final number in hindsight. For example, as sybil is covering the last of nflx shorts at 120 from 280 averages they have sybil "shorted at 180 and covered at a wipe out loss of 304.61... Syb s pops up on the next stol, repeat process... This idiot was pumping nflx north of 280, just like this Stupid stok... Sybs will be making an absolute arsload on this stupid sheity manipubot stok play and this nasdaq idiot will be jerking off filling in sybils numbers for all those "losses"

Topic.Title: Amazon to pay taxes in PA.

Message.Msg: The customer bears a high cost than he/she used to. There was an interesting article in a Philly publication asking people. Most said it won't affect their purchase of diapers and all that, only high value/big ticket items. Exactly the selection bias that will impair Amazon's economic performance. More shipping of the lower value density goods...
